bug.short_desc: Repository with symlinks causes warnings in "quiet" mode

long_desc.thetext:
The intention of the -q flag is to get rid of the normal progress output, but this is a warning message and should not be removed by the -q flag.
We should probably add a configuration variable if links are allowed or not.
Jan St√•le Berg have a patch queued that replace the printing to stdout/err with a logging framework, so you can expect that to be fixed in the nearby future.
